paper_abstract: The problem of exact null controllability is considered for linear neutral type systems with distributed delay. A characterization of this problem is given. The minimal time of controllability is precised. The results are based on the analysis of the Riesz basis property of eigenspaces in Hilbert space. Recent results on the moment problem and properties of exponential families are used.
paper_title: On exact controllability of linear time delay systems of neutral type
